alert.note: Alert for Green; Lafayette; Rock (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 1:35AM CDT until July 24 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lafayette County in south central Wisconsin... Green County in south central Wisconsin... Western Rock County in south central Wisconsin... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 135 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near New Glarus to near Winslow, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monroe, Evansville, Brodhead, Belleville, New Glarus, Orfordville, Brooklyn, Monticello, Albany, Argyle, Footville, Newark, Magnolia, Dayton, South Wayne, Browntown, Attica, Cooksville, Juda and Avon. This includes the following Location York Memorial Church. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
